cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release;-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=/usr/bin/python3;-DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=X86;-DLLVM_INCLUDE_TESTS=NO;-DLLVM_REQUIRES_RTTI=YES;-DLLVM_ENABLE_ASSERTIONS=NO;-DLLVM_ENABLE_WARNINGS=NO;-DLLVM_ENABLE_TERMINFO=YES;-DLLVM_BUILD_TOOLS=OFF;-DLLVM_BUILD_UTILS=OFF;-DLLVM_BUILD_RUNTIME=OFF;-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/cc;-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/c++;-GUnix Makefiles;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>'
